product_hook: Our mortgage offers the lowest interest rates for first-time homebuyers in the UAE.

INITIAL.message_template: Hello {name}! This is Alex from ABC Bank. We're reaching out about our new mortgage with the lowest interest rates for first-time homebuyers in the UAE. Would you be interested in a quick 60-second check to see if you're eligible?

on_positive.message: Excellent! Let me ask you a few quick questions to check your eligibility.

on_negative.message: No problem! If you change your mind, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

on_unclear.message: I want to make sure I understand correctly. Are you interested in learning more about our mortgage offer? Please reply with 'Yes' or 'No'.

QUESTION_1.message: Question 1 of 3: Are you a salaried individual or self-employed?

on_invalid.message: Please specify if you are 'Salaried' or 'Self-employed'.

QUESTION_2.message: Question 2 of 3: What is your approximate monthly income in AED?

on_invalid.message: Please provide your monthly income as a number (e.g., 15000).

on_below_minimum.message: Thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, our minimum income requirement is AED 5,000 per month. We appreciate your time!

QUESTION_3.message: Question 3 of 3: Are you a UAE national or an expatriate resident?

on_invalid.message: Please specify if you are a 'UAE National' or 'Expatriate Resident'.

on_qualified.message_template: Great! Based on your answers, you're a good candidate. Please book a call with a mortgage specialist at your convenience here: {calendly_link}

on_not_qualified.message: Thank you for your time! Unfortunately, you don't meet our current eligibility criteria. We'll keep your information and reach out if our requirements change.

error_handling.unclear_response_message: I didn't quite understand that. Could you please rephrase your answer?
error_handling.technical_error_message: I'm experiencing technical difficulties. A team member will reach out to you shortly. Thank you for your patience!
